DOC.brief_title: Measuring Ethnic Disparities Family Planning Services Peru
DOC.detailed_description: The study aim evaluate , causal way , whether health provider Peru might contribute ethnic health disparity provision family planning service . We perform field experiment combine audit study simulate patient methodology . The study population consist clinic Metropolitan Lima administer Ministry Health provide family planning counseling service . The sample study include 351 clinic . The primary outcome measure study composite service provider compliance guideline technical task family plan counseling . We pre-defined indigenous mestizo profile use distinctive cultural attribute clothing , style hair , posture pattern speech . With 1:1 allocation per computer generate randomization schedule , use permute block four , clinic assign sequence ethnic profile , either receive indigenous mestizo profile ( sequence 1 ) mestizo indigenous profile ( sequence 2 ) two period . The trial comprise two treatment period five week 's duration . The second treatment period follow sequence visit first one obtain least five-week 'wash-out ' period mask study .
